items.name: Joe Frogger
items.description: A Joe Frogger cookie is a traditional New England molasses cookie that is spiced with ginger, cloves, and allspice, and sweetened with a touch of rum flavoring. These large, chewy cookies originated in the 18th century and are named after Joseph Brown, a freed African American who popularized them in Marblehead, Massachusetts.

items.name: *No Empty Bellies* Gingerbread Cookie
items.description: This gingerbread cookie is a delicious, spiced treat combining ginger, cinnamon, and cloves with the rich, floral sweetness of honey. This variation on the classic gingerbread cookie offers a softer texture and a deeper, more complex flavor profile, making it a festival favorite.

items.name: The Patrick Henry: *Give me liberty or give me death by Chocolate* Chunk Cookie
items.description: A classic and indulgent treat, characterized by its soft and chewy texture with a slightly crisp edge. Generously studded with rich, melty chunks of high-quality chocolate, each bite offers a delightful balance of buttery sweetness and deep cocoa flavor, making it a favorite comfort food for chocolate lovers of all ages.

items.name: The Lord Dunmore: *Make me Swoon* Chocolate Macaroon
items.description: A decadent treat featuring a moist, tender texture from shredded coconut combined with rich, melted chocolate. This delightful confection balances the tropical sweetness of coconut with the deep, satisfying flavor of chocolate, creating a perfect bite-sized indulgence that's crispy on the outside and irresistibly chewy on the inside.

items.name: The John Adams: *I will not budge* Pecan Fudge Cookie
items.description: A rich and indulgent treat that combines the deep, velvety flavors of chocolate fudge with the buttery crunch of toasted pecans. Each bite offers a delightful contrast between the soft, chewy cookie base and the nutty, slightly caramelized pecans, creating a decadent and satisfying dessert experience.

items.name: Variety Pack: The Cooki-E pluribus unum
items.description: One of each of the above cookies. Save $2

items.name: Providence Applesauce Cake
items.description: A wholesome and moist dessert that blends the nutty flavor of whole wheat flour with the natural sweetness of applesauce. Infused with the flavors of cinnamon and vanilla, this cake offers a delightful balance of heartiness and subtle sweetness, making it a perfect treat for a comforting, home-baked experience.

items.name: The Crispus Attucks Rice Crispy Bar
items.description: A classic, nostalgic treat made by combining crispy rice cereal with gooey, melted marshmallows and a touch of butter and vanilla. This simple yet irresistible confection boasts a delightful contrast between its crunchy texture and sweet, chewy goodness, making it a favorite for both kids and adults alike.

items.description: Authentic recipe, baked on-site in a wood-fired, brick oven by the baker's apprentice. Limited Availability
